thread.title: Hip Hop Week In Review: Chris Brown vs. Soulja Boy, Nicki Minaj Breaks Up With Meek Mill & Ricky Harris Funeral Fight
thread.title_full: Hip Hop Week In Review: Chris Brown vs. Soulja Boy, Nicki Minaj Breaks Up With Meek Mill & Ricky Harris Funeral Fight

author: Cherise Johnson
title: Hip Hop Week In Review: Chris Brown vs. Soulja Boy, Nicki Minaj Breaks Up With Meek Mill & Ricky Harris Funeral Fight
text:
This week in Hip Hop, Soulja Boy starts off 2017 beefing with Chris Brown. Nicki Minaj confirms her breakup with Meek Mill and a fight involving Snoop Dogg reportedly breaks out at Ricky Harris’ funeral. Soulja Boy & Chris Brown Get Ready To Rumble 
Two days into the year, Soulja Boy starts some mess with Chris Brown , accusing him of dialing him up for liking a picture of his ex-girlfriend, Karrueche Tran, and wanting to fight. 
Chris Brown, of course, denies he ever called him and offers Big Soulja a “grown man ass whopping” while dragging Kae in the process. 
This whole ordeal caused Chris and Kae to start beefing . He snapped back at her Instagram comment and admitted to busting down all of her friends while asking, “HOW DO WE KNOW YOU AGAIN?” 
Back to Soulja and Chris. The two are now slated to fight in an official boxing match. Soulja brought Breezy’s daughter Royalty into the equation and Breezy is pissed. 
“Stop saying shit about my fucking daughter, bro,” Chris said in an IG video clip. “This not no fucking game, my nigga. Now you playing with something else, that’s gonna take the shit somewhere else.” 
Soulja Boy is now training with Floyd Mayweather and Chris has been prepping to fight with the help of Mike Tyson . All of this being orchestrated by 50 Cent. 
Who you got? 
Read more here . Omeeka Is Canceled. That’s Over. 
What folks speculated about Nicki Minaj and Meek Mill’s relationship being over has been confirmed by Nicki herself. 
She announced the breakup on Twitter and ever since then, Safaree has made it known that he wants that old thang back . 
Meek isn’t letting the relationship go without throwing a little salt by clowning her Giuseppe Zanotti sneakers. 
It doesn’t matter what Meek says, though. He took an L this year already, according to the internet. @NICKIMINAJ @MeekMill with one of the first Ls of the new year pic.twitter.com/tye3gmOV2h 
Read more here . Fight Breaks Out At Ricky Harris’ Funeral 
Sherri Shepherd got on social media to broadcast a fight at Ricky Harris ‘ funeral between Snoop Dogg’s bodyguard and a cousin of the late comedian. The relative questioned why Snoop was there, calling him a “bitch-ass nigga” and was consequently tossed out the funeral. 
It’s understood that the fight wasn’t as bad as Sherri made it seem, so she apologized for her reaction. 
“Sorry for any distress the video caused,” she said and acknowledged that filming the ordeal on Periscope was “an impulsive and emotional reaction after what I later learned was a misunderstanding.” 
Read more here . DXclusives: La’Britney & Master P 
Detroit’s own La’Britney has made an impression on a few celebrities like R. Kelly and 50 Cent, and in an interview with DX, she explains her creative process that caught the attention of so many. 
“I found this app that was a collage app that allowed me to create videos by piecing multiple videos together,” she explained to HipHopDX . “Then I did a couple of videos where I was just singing and thought it would be dope to recreate beats with household items. That’s how I started doing them. Just adding pieces of my talent into the ‘LA Mixes.’ Then, I started integrating choreography and dance. It went from me just singing with myself to me singing and creating the beats. It helped because you got to know me as an artist in 15 seconds.” 
Elsewhere, Master P spoke with DX and gave his insight on the whole Soulja Boy and Chris Brown debacle. 
“I think it’s going to be hard because this is not a time for that,” he tells Justin Hunte. “A lot of people die, we have police brutality and a lot of these artists now can’t even move the way they need to move because it’s so much conflict and so much beef. I just don’t entertain it to be honest with you. I come from a different millennium where we’re just different. I feel like if something happens to any one of these guys, it’s a waste of talent. I would hate to see that. So, I’m definitely praying for them and hope this blows over.”
